title: Club Issue / Mobile App
body:
On behalf of a friend - the issue with clubs seems to have locked him out of the club - he was the leader of the club too. He cannot open the club, cant talk to the club however he can see the club,  however I think its part due to the mobile app - can you unlink the app manually?

or does he need to set a support ticket?

replies.body:
We should be able to assist him in resolving this if he submits a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
